content: This is an awesome app for spelling. It's really given massive boost to my kids spelling practice. Perfect for kids age 4 and up.

Update: Added star due to core functionality, but Parent Zone still needs work. Between the forced use of the in-app keyboard, copy/paste/fill reatrictions making a password manager useless, and switching apps dropping you back to the Home screen, the login experience is horrible. As the login is not stored, the whole painful process must be repeated every time you click on the Cloud tab. Recorded audio fluctuates randomly. Sharing tests is cumbersome and needs streamlining.
replyContent: Hi Dan. Sorry to hear you found using the parent area frustrating. We deliberately don't store passwords, as the app is used in shared environments such as schools. Nobody else has mentioned fluctuating audio... if you let us know the specifics there, we can try and help - info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Endless circles. I put in our specific spelling words, and then go to play games to practice. Nothing works, and you are redirected constantly, and asked to download more stuff. Not user friendly. Not simple. How hard is it to design a simple fun app to learn spelling words!?!?
replyContent: Hi Jody. Can you e-mail info@keystagefun.co.uk so we can try to help you? When you say "nothing works", what exactly do you mean? Are you seeing an error message? You definitely shouldn't have to download "more stuff" either. If you e-mail us, with some specifics and perhaps screenshots of any issues, I'm sure we can assist you. Thanks, Ian.

content: My kids love this. Maybe a little too much. I wish there was a desktop version too.
There is only 1 kind of game.
replyContent: Hi. As an educational app, we only include one type of "reward" game. There are also 25 different characters, power ups and stars to win, to trade for better equipment to use in the reward game. A balance between education and fun at an affordable price. Too many "games" and it's less education and more game. Sorry it missed the mark for you. Ian

content: Very good app, just one demerit. Children took too much time finding the words from keyboard and got bored. Giving them a smaller group of letter as option was better. For example, the letters c, s, i, u, r, c, k, l,e can be given as option to write " circle" to see whether they write " circle" or "surkel". It will help children to not waste time in bigger keyboard and will also point out for them that the spelling in their head ("surkel") is not the right one.
replyContent: Hi Mariz. Thanks for your feedback. We're trying to mirror the process of spelling a word from scratch where you have all the letters to choose from. Your example works because of the letters like "c" that have several sounds, but a lot of letters don't - and it would be obvious what the correct letters were in those instances. Thanks. Ian.

content: Sometimes the recording doesnt work
replyContent: Hi Dijaun. If you e-mail us on info@keystagefun.co.uk then we can try and get to the bottom of the issue. We've not heard from anyone else with this problem, but if we know what device you're using and where / when the issue is occurring, we can look into it further. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: This game is great, we have been using it for years.
replyContent: Hi. Thank you for leaving a review and for your positive feedback! Take care. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: It has amazing graphics and kids at any age can have a nice, relaxing spelling test that any freinds, random kids around the world and family can make and there is also a little boomerang game and thats where you can get better squeebles and better boomerangs! Plus, your squeeble can throw the boomerang and you get more coins for better squeebles and boomerangs and you get coins by completing spelling tests! So it basically encourages your child to do a spelling test! It's a wonderful app!
replyContent: Hi Micah. Thanks so much for your feedback - glad you like the app. Take care. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Great, but access to some of the settings are only available when you set up a child, which is frustrating
replyContent: Hi Ross. Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. You can edit all settings both when setting up a child and later on. Just go to Parent / Teacher Zone > Players > Settings (next to the individual child's name) and you'll see all the settings there. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Very useful for both my children aged 4 and 6. Love the custom tests.
replyContent: Hi Karenza. Thanks for your feedback - glad your children are enjoying the app!! Take care. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Purchased the range of apps to add to my family library for our 2 children to find you have to purchase again for each device, not great with 2 kids
replyContent: Hi Calum. We have no control over the purchasing or installation of our apps, or access to your account to see what the issue might be. All our apps are available for Family Library. If you can resolve the issue with Google, it would be great if you could then update your rating on the basis of what you think of the app. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.
Thanks for the review Frankie. Glad you like the app!! Ian, KeyStageFun

content: In response to my son leaving a negative review due to not wanting to learn any new spellings today. I love squeebles, we use it every day for my 6 and 9 year old. Brilliant app.
replyContent: Hi Claire. Thank you for taking the time to update your review. Your response to the reason for the original review made us laugh! Glad you're finding Squeebles helpful and I hope your son is finding doing his spellings a little more enjoyable today! All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: I've just paid for this app and now it keeps disappearing from the screen in the middle of using it?
replyContent: Hi Teresa. If you e-mail us at info@keystagefun.co.uk then we can try and help you resolve the issue. We can't replicate it and we have had no other reports of it happening from anyone else. I suspect this is an issue to do with your device / Google Play account, but regardless, if you contact us then we can help sort it out. Thanks. Ian

content: Very good
replyContent: Thanks Eli - glad you like the app!!

content: Well Perfect for leaning spellings
Awful
replyContent: Dave. Sorry to hear you didn't like this app. What is it exactly you weren't keen on? The majority of the children and their parents using this app are very positive about it, so I'm wondering why such a different reaction from you? If there was a problem, let us know and we'll see if we can resolve it. Thanks, Ian - info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Great app. It's really easy to configure new tests and the downloadable ones are very useful. Most importantly, both kids (8 & 5) really like it. Only minor complaint is that the that some of the pre-recorded words on the downloadable tests can be slightly unclear and would benefit from an example of usage.
replyContent: Hi Richard. Thanks for your positive review and for giving your feedback. We are in the process of re-recording the downloadable tests to bring the quality of some of the older ones in line with the newer tests. You can, if you wish, in the meantime, re-record any you want to add usage examples to. Thanks, Ian - info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: I purchased this app, entered my password in the parent section and began creating my list. Suddenly it closed! I tried logging in and it refused to accept my password. I received instructions to go to keystagefun/passcode to reset my password. Tried doing this and again the site will not accept my email address. Thought I got it wrong, tried another email address but website refused this too. Such a pity! App seemed promising.
replyContent: Hi Vanesa. If you e-mail us we can very easily sort this out. If it is the 4 digit parent passcode you are after, this must have been set by someone using the app. If you e-mail us, as our website suggests, we can give you the override passcode. Please do so and we will get the issue resolved. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: I already have this app on one device which works brilliantly so I paid to download to a second device to share tests I had recorded. The process to set up an account to share tests is problematic, and when I finally got it to work and shared the test, it will only share without the audio so spellings would need to be re recorded. I have deleted on second device. What a shame and a missed opportunity for this app which is otherwise excellent.
replyContent: Hi Heather. Any test shared from one device to another should also share the audio. Setting up an account should be relatively straightforward - you just fill in a form on our website and click the confirmation link in the e-mail you receive. If you can be more specific about what the issues have been, we will try to help. Thanks. Ian.

content: I have just tried to purchase this on an Android device it has not downloaded on the device that I wanted and you have taken my money.but it seems to be allowing me to download it on my phone device which I do not want it to. Not happy!! It has seem to rectify and come up on the device which I intended it to. Seems to be working. Hopefully my child will benefit from it. Thanks
replyContent: Hi Kelly. The purchase and installation of any app is handled by the Google Play Store itself, not by us (the developer). We have no control over that or any way of looking into it, so your 1 star review is somewhat misplaced. We would suggest you contact Google directly and they will be able to resolve the issue. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Makes practicing our words less stressful! We've used it the last couple years, I have one that's used it 4th-6th grade and one has used it preschool- 1st grade. I'm proud to say we get 100% right every week on our spelling test! I load their words and make sentences over the weekend then EVERY time we are in the car I pass them my phone and they practice. I love I can check their progress to see if they are getting it or struggling! I highly recommend this app!

My son is much much weaker at spelling compared to all his other subjects. This app has transformed his results. He is in Yr 5 (age 9) and would naturally get about 12 out of 20 right. With this app he has had 20 out of 20 on 4 of the 5 weeks he has used it and got 29 out of 30 the other week. He obviously needs to hear it to learn the words. Amazing. The downside is that you have to enter the words each week but it doesn't take too long. There are inbuilt tests too.
you should get this app because you can add your own spellings on and it is just amazing
It's really help me get better at speling

The app keeps freezing after approximately one minute into the spelling game which is extremely frustrating for my daughter who is trying to practise her spellings. I hope someone can fix this issue soon or it is just 4 pounds wasted
replyContent: Hi Emma. Sorry to hear you’re having this issue. It’s not something we can replicate or that anyone else is experiencing to our knowledge, so I suspect it’s something specific to your device or type of device. Can I ask what kind of device you’re using please? If you email us on info@keystagefun.co.uk we can look into it further. Thanks. Ian

content: Easy to use
this helps our son learn to spell he realy likes thank you
replyContent: Glad you've found it helpful! Thanks for taking the time leave a review Rudy. All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Awesome for little kids with a long spelling homework list
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Lisa. Glad you like the app! Ian

content: isn't loading
replyContent: Hi Andrew. Can you elaborate please? If you can't download the app from the store then it is something you need to contact Google about. If you have downloaded the app and you're having problems running it, let us know. We haven't heard from anyone else with this issue. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Another brilliant app for making learning fun, the only downside to this is the words are said in a 'southern' accent and it is quite confusing for my son hearing the 'ar' sound in 'path' to him it is p,a,th not p,ar,th as it is pronounced in the app.
replyContent: Hi James. We understand your frustration. Ideally of course we'd provide different options and it's something we're looking at. The time involved in re-recording every single word in multiple accents is obviously huge, so we have to weigh it up against the other features we'd like to add. Thanks. Ian

content: Best spelling app I have found
replyContent: Thanks Joanne - really pleased to hear you like the app!

content: I use this for my son's weekly school spellings. I made it more fun by recording the word followed by a funny description (ie "bucket, as in a bucket full of poop!"). As a typical boy he finds this hilarious! My only disappointment is that it doesn't seem possible to transfer my son's points, tricky words etc between devices. I downloaded it to my phone and then his tablet and can upload/download my tests using the cloud, but can't see a way to do this for player info. Is this possible?
replyContent: Hi Hayley. Sorry for the delayed response - the one slipped through the net for some reason. You can transfer words / spelling lists between devices, but at this point, not scores / progress I'm afraid. It's something we're looking into. Thanks, Ian.

content: This is a time saver when the are lots of spellings to learn.
replyContent: Thanks Clare - really pleased to hear you've found the app helpful. Ian

content: love the custom tests
replyContent: Glad you like the app! Thanks for the feedback. Ian

content: unable to use as there is no sound
replyContent: Hi. Can you let us know the specific issue? Is there no sound when recording words? Or when playing back? Do the sounds within the app work but just not the recording? Your microphone requires permissions setting to allow the app to use it... if these are off then the app won't be able to record. E-mail info@keystagefun.co.uk for assistance.

content: I tried installing this app twice on my brand new Chromebook. It won't let me get past the first page to register a new user.
replyContent: Hi Tania. Can you let us know the model Chromebook / version of the OS you're using? We don't actually support Chromebook (we never have officially), but I am aware people install Android apps on Chromebook, so it is something we'll look into and attempt to resolve. Thanks. Ian

content: Excellent app but since the update its not possible to change squeeble. The squeebles are in the top left of the screen with a white bar across the screen and no buttons to press.
replyContent: Hi - we're aware of this, have fixed it and just uploaded a fix which should be live within a few hours. Apologies for the inconvenience. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Great app in making spelling fun. However wish the app would work with a physical keyboard as well as the on screen keyboard
It's good
I read reviews and download the app but unfortunately! no recommendation I would like to get my refund.
replyContent: We're very sorry you didn't find our spelling app to be right for you. Of course if you send your Google Play order number / receipt to info@keystagefun.co.uk then we will refund your purchase. All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Rubbish pathetic and it costs money
replyContent: We're sorry you feel that way. Our apps do indeed cost a small amount of money and this is due to the substantial development time that goes into creating and maintaining them. This also allows us to ensure they are free from adverts or in app purchases. All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Love squeebles apps!
replyContent: Thank you Sanchia. We're glad you like our apps! Take care, Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: My 8 year old son was having difficulty with his spellings and his spellings homework was causing him alot of frustration. This app has helped immensely. I was easily able to set a test with his full weeks worth of spellings and could see an instant improvement in his effort and learning. The app awards correct answers with tokens to play minigames and my son loves it. Thank you Dev Team, very impressed with purchase.
replyContent: Hi Gavin. Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review. We're really pleased the app has been so helpful for your son and that he's found his spelling improving. Well done to him for working so hard! Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Cool
replyContent: Thanks Andrew - glad you like the app! Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Amazing app
replyContent: Thanks Sam - glad you like it! All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun.

content:
This ago works fine on my phone; Samsung S7, but the playback / recording 
volume does not work properly on my Lenovo tablet; TB8504F running Android 
7.1.1. When creating custom tests it does record, but the playback is so 
quiet you can barely hear it. I have tested that the microphone works 
correctly using recorder app and checked playback volume, it is on maximum 
and is booming if playing from you tube. Don't understand what the problem 
is, but it makes the app completely unusable for custom tests on a tablet. 
One thing I have noticed is that when using the key stage tests, the 
difference between voice volume compared to the other notification sounds 
is much greater on the tablet. On the phone they are all a similar level, 
on the tablet the voice playback is much quieter than the notifications, 
though not nearly as quiet as when they are your own recordings.
replyContent: Hi Clare. We bought the same tablet and found that when we upgraded the version of Android to the latest version, this problem went away. It seems to be a well known issue for Lenovo tablets - if you search online you'll find lots of people mentioning it with regard to various apps running on Lenovo. E-mail info@keystagefun.co.uk for more info.

content: Fantastic app. Wanted something to help 6 year old daughter practice her weekly spelling and this is the best app by far, it is more expensive but I think it's worth it compared to other cheaper/free apps but a free trial version wouldn't go amiss.  I've given it 4 stars as I feel there are a few things that could improve it the biggest being the keyboard. My daughter takes some time to type each word not being used to a qwerty keyboard, I'd prefer for her to be able to write the word rather than type it so would like to see either an option to use Android keyboard which can then be switched to handwriting input or a similar in-game method. Alternatively, how about a scrollable A-Z keyboard which would also help develop the child's alphabet learning. A time limit for each word would be a good idea.  As stated, it is a great app and pretty well polished, would recommend it especially as it has prerecorded UK English voices as well as ability to add your own.
replyContent: Hi Paul, thanks for the review. Your suggestions are good ones as alternative options for those not wanting to use a Qwerty keyboard particularly. You can set a time limit for the words by the way - in the parent / teacher area, Players > Settings (for a specific player) and then the top option. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Easy to use and encourages children to keep trying.
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review Jonathan. Glad you've found the app easy to use. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: This works well on my phone, but my son enjoyed using it on my chromebook.  It worked well up until today where it has stopped working so we have had to revert back to using the app on my phone
replyContent: Hi Lesley. The app wasn't originally designed to run on Chromebook - I presume you are running it through Android on Chromebook? This should work "in theory" for most apps, but the reality is that a lot of apps behave strangely when running in this way. If you can let us know exactly what's wrong, we'll look into it. Thanks. Ian

content: I am a primary teacher and parent of a year 2 boy who is struggling with his spelling! Well, this app will definitely ensure he'll ace those dreaded SATs. This is truly an excellent resource. The spellings are matched to the national curriculum objectives that your child will be covering in school. I might even see if I can use it with my class!! It's a very child friendly and my son won't out it down!! Super!!
replyContent: Hi Holly. Thanks so much for your review. We're really pleased to hear that you've found the app so helpful! All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: School spellings?  It doesn't take long to record them and Squeebles is a much more fun way of leaning them.
replyContent: Hi Sandie. Thanks for taking the time to leave a review and pleased to hear you've been happy with our app. Any suggestions or questions, let us know. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Fantastic brilliant. ..just what my 8 year old son needs to make learning his spelling interactive and fun. Ian was amazingly helpful too when I had issues with Google pay.
replyContent: Hi Sarah. Thank you for your positive feedback and glad we could be of help. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Edit: this review is out of date. The developer updated the app. First class developer.   This app is fantastic in many ways, however it fails in one very important way. When a spelling is incorrect the correct spelling is shown alongside a button to continue. I have noticed that this button is just pressed immediately, giving no time for learning the correct spelling. This leads to reinforcing the incorrect spelling - which is the last thing we want!  This could be solved by having the child enter the correct spelling with the word visible and playing a negative sound when an incorrect character is pressed and a positive sound when it is correct. Only showing the proceed button once it has been entered.  This could be an option in the player settings if needed.  I hope you will consider adding something along these lines.   Edit: thanks for the reply. I look forward to seeing what you do with it  Edit2: Thank you very much. It looks great. I'll try it on my daughter tommorow.
replyContent: Hi Sky. We've updated the app (v6.0 in app stores now) to feature a setting that means children are asked to retype the word by copying it out if they get the answer incorrect. Go to the Parent Zone - Players - Settings (for the player you want to change it for) and scroll down and select yes for the "Retype word" option. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Got this app less than 10 min ago, and so far we love it. My son hates studying, but I really believe this will help. LOVE that you can add your own words. It's your own recorded voice your child hears, not a robotic voice that misprounces or doesn't enunciate. You can make multiple spelling lists and have multiple users, each with their own personalized lists. Definitely worth the money.
Uses a keyboard for letter selection. Kids don't know how to type so get fustrated finding letters.
replyContent: Hi Andrew. Thanks for the review. We'd be interested to know if you have a suggestion for how to present the letters a child would need to select to spell a word that may be more suited to you? We avoided multiple choice because of the element of guesswork involved in getting a correct answer, particularly on shorter words. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Amazing app. My daughter who hates doing spelling had now asked me to upload he next four weeks of tests on to it. I had been using another app but that messed up after an update. So glad I found this. It s brilliant and got my daughter engaged and motivated in spelling
replyContent: Hi Jo. Thanks for the positive review. We're really glad to hear that your daughter has found the motivation to work at her spellings and is finding success through her hard work! All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: It's great but this is the 2nd time I'm going to need to uninstall and reinstall because the sound has become distorted
Best educational thing I've bought, my son loves doing his spellings now and has improved so much!
replyContent: Hi there! That's fantastic to hear - really pleased you've found the app so helpful. All the best, Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: It is an amazing app but it constantly freezes. I wish a patch will be released soon! My son [8 years old] gets so frustrated when he has to start over.  Using Samsung S4 and S5.
replyContent: Hi there. Can you let us know exactly when / where in the app you're experiencing the problem? We've not heard from anyone else with this issue and we can't replicate the problem in any of our testing. For us to find a fix for the issue we'll need a bit more info. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Great app so far for my 6 and 8 year old. Love the ability to record your own words. Would be 5* if the app responded to tablet rotation. We have a rigid case with a support for use on a table. As a result the app appears upside down.
This app only records me about 30% of the time. Very frustrating. Used to work great and now it sucks. I expect more from a $5 app.
replyContent: Hi Rachel. We have fixed an issue on Android 7 that saw some devices experience this problem. The update will be live in the Play Store within a couple of hours. If this doesn't fix the issue, please let us know so we can investigate further. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: What a brilliant  app
replyContent: Thanks Sara - glad you like it!

content: Crashes and won't record a lot. Quite frustrating. I have a Sony experia (Android). Once I've finally recorded the test words it is amazing and my son loves it. Great revision tool
replyContent: Hi Victoria. An update on this - we just released an update to the app that should fix the issue. It seemed to be occurring with a small number of Sony devices running Android 7. If you still experience problems, please let me know. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Nice app.  Would be 5 stars if it ran better on new Android on chrome os.  Crashes too often.
replyContent: Hi Darren. We're looking at offering versions of our apps tailored to Chrome OS, but for now it's not something they have been optimised for, so it's very possible you will experience problems. Thanks, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Great App wonderful customer service too. Thank you.
replyContent: If you e-mail us on info@keystagefun.co.uk we'll send you the override code. Thanks! Ian

content: My son loves it. Its easy for parent to load new test.
replyContent: Glad to hear your son likes the app! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. Ian

content: Totally worth the money! My daughter was reluctant to practice for her spelling tests, but is now happily getting 10 out of 10 each week after playing with the Squeebles!
replyContent: Hi Lisa. So pleased to hear that your daughter has found the app helpful and that she's doing so well in her spelling tests. Have a great weekend! Ian

content: We were practising spellings every night with my 6 year old lad but he was really struggling, usually getting 3 or 4 out of 15 in tests. It was upsetting him and as reluctant as I was to allow use of technology to help (being old fashioned) I bought this app. He loves playing it and got his first 12/12 on a test on Monday! Can't ask for a better result. This app is perfect.  Thank you!!
replyContent: Hi Jim. Thanks for taking the time to leave a review and really pleased to hear that you've found the app so helpful. All the best! Ian.

content: It works very well in the presentation of the words, the management of them and in the application of collectables and gamification as motivational aids.  However the inconsistency of the recording function on my Nexus 6p is horribly frustrating, sometimes taking half a dozen attempts to get any recording at all!
replyContent: Hi Paul. Sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with this. If you get in touch with us we'll try and help. We have a Nexus 6P here that we test on and can't replicate this issue. It would be good to know what version of Android you're using etc. Thanks. Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Absolutely amazing.  We had a small issue that was linked to my device and their support was beyond incredible. I simply can't say enough good things about the company behind this app and how they treat customers and for me that's 90% of it.  As for the app itself, my daughter won't put it down.  She's gets top marks every week in spelling now and I'm certain the exposure this app helps give her to her words helps.  She's always trying to get more tosses and new Squeebles and that just makes her work harder on her spelling.  Love the app and will be buying the Times Tables as well.
replyContent: Thanks Matt. Really appreciate your kind words and the time you've taken to leave a review. Anything else we can do, please let me know. Thanks, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Excellent
replyContent: Thanks. Glad you're happy with the app! All the best, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Really good for children
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. Glad you've found the app helpful. All the best, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: You need to add the word and then save, after that you need to create audio file for each word.  There are apps that already have the words and audio.
replyContent: Hi Michael. The app actually contains over 2000 words available for download at no extra charge, all with audio recorded by us. If you go into the Parent / Teacher area, these are all available within the "KeyStageFun" tests section. Let me know if you need any help finding them. Thanks, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Don't normally leave reviews, but this app is great. Helping my daughter get 10 out of 10 in her spelling tests when she was struggling. Best £3 I've ever spent! Thank you!
replyContent: Thanks Dan. Really appreciate you taking the time to leave a review and glad to hear your daughter has found the app helpful. All the best. Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: At last, a great educational app. My 4 year old gets spelling lists from his teacher every week. I just copy them to his tablet and he learns to spell the words a lot quicker.
replyContent: Thanks David. Glad your 4 year old has been finding Squeebles helpful for his spellings. Appreciate you leaving a review. Thanks, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: My 7 year old kids love recording there own words for there weekly school spelling test. One of them got 10/10 this week, the other 9/10. The only downside that I can see is that if there tablets go into standby, the app closes?
replyContent: Hi Jason. Thanks for the positive feedback. We'll look into the issue with the app closing when the tablet goes into standby. It's not something that should be happening. What type of device are you using if you don't mind me asking? Thanks, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Found this app very helpful for my child. I did not find it hard to navigate and she was willing to do more then I expected.
replyContent: That's great to hear Jessica - glad your daughter has found the app helpful. Thanks for leaving a review. All the best, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Just what we were looking for.  I enter my daughter's spelling words every week.  She gets squeebles to play squeeberang or something when she gets words correctly.  I don't understand the weird game she's playing.  But she thinks it's like pokemon go for your brain.  It's a winner.
replyContent: Thanks Mia. Glad your daughter's enjoying doing her spellings with Squeebles. Appreciate the review and positive feedback. Thanks, Ian. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Would be good if the microphone worked. It worked on the first  2 words now refuses.

Usually when this happens it's a hardware issue - we've not heard from anyone else who is having a problem with the recording at the moment... thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun. info@keystagefun.co.uk

content: Love that I can record custom word lists. I coordinate with my child's spelling test each week. The characters are cute and there's just enough reward for him to want to "play" every time.
replyContent: Thank you. So pleased to hear you're finding the app helpful and your son has been enjoying playing with it. Thanks! Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Fantastic app my 7 year old has done so well with it
replyContent: Thanks for taking the time to write a review Janette. Much appreciated! Glad to hear your 7 year old has been enjoying Squeebles.

content: I am 8 and this app helps me how to spell
replyContent: That's great to hear! Glad you've been enjoying the app.

content: There getting 10\10 every time
replyContent: Thanks for letting us know Louis. Glad to hear your children are doing so well with their spellings.

content: Lots of issues. Last straw after setting more than 20 spellings only one recorded therefore useless. Very annoyed.
replyContent: Hi Matthew. As per our response to your e-mail, if you can be more specific about exactly what the problems have been then we can try and help. The majority of our customers experience no problems recording, so it could be an issue with your device. If you can get in touch then I'm sure we can resolve the problems. Many thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Really helping my son with his spellings.    Suggestion: 1) should be able to merge tests as i delete some of the words as they get too easy. 2) on last go in stats should show how many tries before they got it right
replyContent: Hi Sarah. Thank you for taking the time to make your suggestions. As per our e-mail response, we will look into point 2 in our next update and we'll also consider ways in which merging tests could work. Thanks! Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Excellent app. Makes learning to spell fun. Highly recommend it.
replyContent: Hi Maureen. Thanks for the review and glad to hear you've found the app so helpful. All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Great App.  My kids gets 100% on school test because of this app. Highly recommended.
replyContent: Hi Fred. Thanks for the feedback and glad to hear your child is doing well in their spelling tests. All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: finally I can get my son to learn his spellings.
replyContent: Thanks Kellie. Glad you like the app!

content: We love the squeeble apps and would definitely recommend them for primary school children. That being said, there are a few issues with the answer registering as incorrect when in fact my daughter has got the answer right. That's the only reason I've not given 5 *
replyContent: Hi there. Thanks for your review. If you can e-mail us on info@keystagefun.co.uk then we'll try and get to the bottom of the issue you mention. We've not heard from anyone else who is having this problem so I'd be interested to know what kind of device you're using and which words this is happening with. Many thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Has really helped both my kids.
replyContent: Thanks for letting us know Tiffany - glad our app has helped your children. All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: For a older one

Really great app - Latest functionality to sync tests is brilliant! Without doubt is most engaging of all the spelling apps. Love your work! My wish list is for a way to sync profiles, scores etc across devices AND if you come out of the app it would be great for it to continue where you left off. My daughter sometimes presses a button when holding the phone and you have to start from beginning.
replyContent: Hi Richard. Glad to hear you've found the app so helpful. We'll take your feedback on board and look into how we might achieve these things. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: I love that this app allows me to customize the spelling lists. Can't seem to change keyboard to lowercase to match what shows up in the box. Gets confusing for kids.
replyContent: Hi Dan. Thanks for the review and glad you like the app. The keyboard can be set to either lower or upper case but it doesn't change on the keypad keys when you press the caps lock key - it's set to mimic a physical keyboard in that sense. Take your point on board though. May be an option we can offer in the future. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: My daughter cannot wait for me to input her weekly spelling words so she can begin playing.
replyContent: Thanks for your positive comments Wendy. Glad to hear your daughter is enjoying the app. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Fantastic
replyContent: Thanks Paul. Glad you like the app. All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Brilliant for Primary Age
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Tabitha. Glad you've found the app to be so useful. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: This is the best spelling app I've found. My 6.5 year old boy is particular taken with the game and takes the tests just to earn the stars. While my 9.5 year old girl who has learning difficulties also wanted to play the tests but wasn't interested in the game side. Thank you for making my life easier!
replyContent: Hi Pippa. Really glad to hear how much your son is enjoying our app and that your daughter has also found it useful. Thank you for taking the time to leave such positive feedback!

content: Really made a difference improving our childrens test scores.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback and really glad to hear how this app helped with your children's scores.

content: Really fun way for children to learn their spellings for school!
replyContent: Hi Carly. Thanks for taking the time to leave feedback. Glad your children have beeb enjoying the app!

content: So I downloaded this "amazing" software for my son, and find out I have to write ALL OF MY OWN SPELLING TESTS?  I registered online to download some, I need a "trusted code"...  Really... who writes this junk?  If I pay £2.50 for something, shouldn't it have the tests and everything built in?  Why, oh, why should I sit down and make new lists of words for my child to spell... THAT'S WHAT I PAY YOU FOR!  Would give it Zero stars if I could.  Avoid!  Oh, and when I try to set a passcode lock for the parent section... I can choose numbers from 1 thru 9... is 0 not acceptable?!?  Who did the QA on this, a monkey?
replyContent: Hi James. You can now actually download (free) over 150 spelling tests that we have created, including nearly 2000 words, so the above review isn't factually correct. The reason these aren't included within the app initially is to save space on your device. I'm sorry the app wasn't for you and that you felt the need to write such a negative review.

content: Great fun app
replyContent: Thanks Nicole. Glad you've found the app helpful! All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun

content: Exactly what I was looking for. Congrats to the Devs. Great app. to get my oldest practicing his weekly tests. Best I've used.
replyContent: Hi Harvey - that's great to hear. Thanks for the feedback and glad to hear you've found the app so useful. All the best. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: This is one of the best kids apps there is. Out little one love that he can hear us say the word then tried to spell it. Words are easy to add and the rewards he gets for doing well really motivate him.
replyContent: Hi Mike. Thanks for your positive feedback. I'm glad your child is enjoying the app and that you've found it helpful. Thanks! Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Some very useful functionality. My kids enjoy using it.
After one week of using this app, both have just got 100%
replyContent: Hi Roger. That's brilliant to hear. Well done to your children. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: We have various devices and there's no way of transfering test from the tablet onto my phone. You have to load the app and start again. Not good.
replyContent: Hi Judy. Thank you for your feedback and sorry that you're not satisfied. This feature was actually released late in 2014, so you can now transfer tests from device to device if you sign up for a KeyStageFun Account (free) at www.keystagefun.co.uk/register. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: We love this app and enjoyed it very much when we first installed. It has been helpful to my daughter with her spelling. Unfortunately, about 2 weeks ago it began to shut down the app while she is in the middle of her weekly spelling words. I thought maybe the word lists were too big, so I started making them smaller. I thought maybe too much memory in the app was being used, so I deleted old tests. All to no avail. She is lucky if she gets 7 words into her weekly list before it shuts down. Any ideas how to fix this? I am running it on a Nexus 7 tablet and have no issues with any other app.
replyContent: Hi there. Sorry to hear you're experiencing problems. We have a Nexus 7 which we test on and can't replicate this issue, so it's very difficult for us to be sure as to what the problem is. If you can e-mail us on info@keystagefun.co.uk then we can get some more details and hopefully fix the issue. Many thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: I am doing summer school curriculum with my daughter and I just plug in her spelling words and she is able to practice spelling them. She's passing all her tests!

Numerous times my daughter has done the test but accidentally hit the back button on my phone exiting the app. Could you add a "do you really want to exit?" When you try to exit? Then we may actually finish a test!
replyContent: Hi Sammie. Based on your feedback, we have now included this feature and it will be released in our next update, due in the next few weeks. Thanks, Ian.

content: Good app,  but now unable to add a test for a second user as the tick options are unavailable,  a quick patch should resolve this
replyContent: Hi Ian. This issue was fixed in a previous update. If you have any problems with this in the future, please e-mail us on info@keystagefun.co.uk. Thanks. Ian, KeyStageFun.

content: Cool game

My daughter was failing more then half her spelling test, I don't always have time I would like to work with her.  It only takes me a few moments to create a test then she can work on it several times a day up until test time, repetition is key with her. She gets mostly 100s with a few 95s here and there now.
Easy to use for parents.  Makes spelling fun for my daughter.

replyContent:
Hi Amanda,
If you can let us know what type of device you're using / which Android version then we can look into this issue. We do test on a wide variety of devices and haven't encountered any issues with the sound on any of them so it could be a problem with your specific device. E-mail us on info@keystagefun.co.uk. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: It was easy to create spelling test, but wouldn't allow for punctuation.  On some screens I had numbers and special characters, but not on others.
replyContent: Hi Michele. If you let us know what punctuation you'd like to see then we can look at including it. We felt that apostrophes and hyphens were both needed but with limited screen space, left out full stops and commas. We're very responsive to customer requests but need to know what exactly you'd like to see included. Thanks, Ian

content: My only criticism is the test keyboard should be in lowercase and change to capitals when shift key is pressed similar to the texting setup on a tablet or mobile.
All works well on my s3 mini and hudl

The app doesn't work properly on the Asus Transformer because the sound recording comes out very fuzzy and the app doesn't support the Transformer keyboard dock.   BUT... The customer service I received when I spoke to the dev was fantastic (offered a refund out of his own pocket when Google wouldn't help!). We need more devs like Keystagefun in the Android world.
Used it on the iPad. Have just got it for the Android
Brilliant! My daughter is happy to learn her spellings every week with this app!
My daughter (8yrs) loves them all. Well thought out, family friendly with lots of features. Developers are great to chat with as well. Cannot recommend highly enough.
Setting up and recording tests works really well, but pretty useless to me as can't see which words my child got right, just how many.  Also annoying that back key quits app.
replyContent: Hi Emma. You can see which words your child got right / wrong. Just go to the parents' zone, tap "Players" then "Test Stats" next to the player name you wish to see stats for. You can then view either the "Last Attempt" stats for the last time that child did that test or "Overall Stats" to show a summary of all attempts. Thanks! KeyStageFun

content: App is now running on the Nook HD+
replyContent: Our apps all now support the Nook HD

content: Nicely presented and well thought out app. Only thing missing is some sort of cloud sync across devices - or backup to dropbox as setting up the tests takes time...

I homeschool my three children and we use this app frequently to review content while on the go to activities. My expectations for an "educational app" are pretty high and this one delivers! We use All About Spelling and I input our weekly words for the kids to practice. It has great flexibilityin terms of setup and it  records the kids' responses so I can see how they did. And a bonus is that it doesn't have to test just spelling. You can record any question that your child can type a quick response to and it will work. Squeebles is fun, easy to use, and well thought out and developed; so is Squeebles Math Bingo, which the kids also love and I thoroughly approve of. Please make more Squeebles games. Something for science, history, or geography maybe?? Thanks for such a great app!!
Apps just don't come better than this.  At last an app which is educational, engaging and supports school work.
Amazing. Great for a son who doesnt like spellings!
What a great way to get my kids (9 and 7) doing their weekly school spelling lists....love love love!
Wanted this app, but it does not work on the Kindle Fire HD.
replyContent: Hi there. I can confirm that this app is now available for Kindle Fire HD and all other Kindle Fire models that include a built in microphone. Thanks, Ian, KeyStageFun

content: This is a great app for helping kids practice their spelling. One thing I would like to see is a word jumble option for practice. One app I had on iOS had that and I found that useful for introducing the words before moving forward to the "test"  practice.

I have two children aged 4 and 6 and they love this game. They WANT to learn spellings in order to earn stars and squeebles to then play the squeeberang game after finishing the test. I love the fact that I can choose the words, record the word and decide how long they get to see the word. The only improvement I can think of is to change the name- I hate the word test! How about Spelling Fun instead?
